Others: The Portland Trail Blazers lost to the San Antonio Spurs with a score of 118-105.
The Trail Blazers struggled with their 3-point shooting, making only 28% of their attempts.
San Antonio shot 44.8% from 3-point range, outperforming Portland.
Shaedon Sharpe made his season debut after shoulder surgery, but the Blazers still lost.
Victor Wembanyama was held to 12 points, 8 rebounds, 4 steals, and 3 blocks by the Blazers.
Chauncey Billups commented that the Blazers were 'chasing our tails' throughout the game.
